pros: Management level are kind and respectful. No micromanagement. A lot of freedom to propose ideas.
cons: The organizational aspect sometimes gets in the way.
Avarage salary too low for students

job_title: Student Assistant PR/Marketing in Heidelberg, Baden-Wurttemberg
pros: Very lovely team and a lot of responsibilties for just a working student, clear instructions but a lot of creative freedomn on how to do the tasks, working hours were quite flexible regarding responsibilities in University
cons: There are not any major disadvantages I could mention, maybe the only thing was not having my own permanently assigned desk
